title: Here are the teams competing at the 2017/2018 Nike All HK Schools Basketball Tournament this weekend
text:
The 2017/2018 Nike All HK Schools Basketball Tournament semi-finals and finals will be held this weekend at the Southorn Stadium in Wanchai, and it's starting tomorrow at 9am.

Eight school teams - four girls' teams and four boys' teams - will be battling it out at the semi-finals tomorrow, which will decide the teams competing in the finals on Sunday.



Nicknamed the “Dream Team”, Heep Yunn School’s girls team will be up against Ying Wa Girls’ School in the semi-finals. Also in the semi-finals is the girls’ team from Chinese YMCA Secondary School who will play against Hon Wah College.

Among the boys' teams, defending champion Ying Wa College will compete against Diocesan Boys’ School, and Po Kok Secondary School will play against Chong Gene Hang College for the final spot in the finals.

Young Post will be live reporting from Sunday’s finals, so make sure you follow us on Instagram @ypotg to catch all the action!
